name: Hushed Casket
description:
In Hushed Casket, you wake from cryosleep to find your ship has been badly damaged and many core systems need repaired. To fix these systems, you'll need to navigate through randomly generated corridors and fight through the mutants which have infested your ship.

Hushed Casket is a roguelike game made in a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1.  The game was created in Gamemaker Studio 2 and all sound assets are from freesound.org.

Controls

  • Movement:  WASD Keys
  • Reload: R Key
  • Interact: E Key
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Fire: Left Mouse Button
  • Exit Game: Escape Key
  • Enter/Exit Fullscreen: Alt + Enter
